byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer reported from Kiev, and Mike McIntire and Barry Meier from New York. Steven Lee Myers contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By ANDREW E. KRAMER, MIKE McINTIRE and BARRY MEIER

abstract: Ukrainian investigators suggest Donald J Trump's campaign manager Paul Manafort received $12.7 million in undisclosed payments, from 2007 to 1012, from pro-Russia party of former Pres Viktor F Yanukovych, for whom Manafort was political consultant; insist Manafort, who denies receiving payments, could not have overlooked regime's corruption.
lead_paragraph: An examination of the activities of Paul Manafort shows how he benefited from powerful interests that are now under scrutiny.
snippet: An examination of the activities of Paul Manafort shows how he benefited from powerful interests that are now under scrutiny....

headline.main: Secret Ledger in Ukraine Lists Cash for Donald Trump’s Campaign Chief
headline.print_headline: Secret Ledger in Ukraine Lists Cash for Trump Aide
